meanings.definition: The act of not renewing something.
meanings.sent1: The nonrenewal of the library membership surprised me.
meanings.sent2: The nonrenewal of the lease led to us moving out.
meanings.sent3: His nonrenewal of the gym membership left him with no place to work out.
meanings.sent4: The nonrenewal of the contract was like a door closing on future opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The nonrenewal of the subscription felt like losing a connection to the world.

meanings.definition: The state of being not renewed.
meanings.sent1: The nonrenewal of the license caused inconvenience.
meanings.sent2: The nonrenewal of the warranty meant we had to pay for repairs.
meanings.sent3: Living in a state of nonrenewal can be frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The garden's nonrenewal reflected neglect and abandonment.
meanings.sent5: The nonrenewal of the passport left her unable to travel abroad.
